patthana8.57:4.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana8.57:5.1: Nanadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.57:6.1: Nadassanena pahātabbañca nanadassanena pahātabbañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.57:7.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
